title: Virginia Ali, Co-founder Ben’s Chili Bowl
itunes:title: Virginia Ali, Co-founder Ben’s Chili Bowl
description:
Guests: Congressman Trey Hollingsworth, a Republican representing Indiana’s 9th district, Virginia Ali, Co-founder of Ben’s Chili Bowl, Mattie Duppler, Founder of Forward Strategies, and Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union, and Kevin Walling, Democratic Strategist at HG Creative media. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
